Lifestyle training

Learn More

The greatest wealth is health

Prevention is better than a cure

Hello and welcome to Washington Wellness for your health and fitness needs. The fitness industry is forever progressing and I believe the client or consumer has to be pointed in the right direction to help progress their health goals. This site is designed to help you embark upon your daily physical activity and at the same time maintain a healthy food regime that will be the most beneficial for you.

Human beings have an idea of becoming physically active, but the use of social media can be a little intimidating to you the "consumer" Here at Washington Wellness I will strive to push you in the right instruction to make you healthier physically, mentally, and emotionally. These components affect your daily activities. Science has proven that meeting fitness goals helps improve daily cognitive function and muscles fire more efficiently to improve your lifestyle. I strive the make the human body a better functional machine.

In closing, you may be asking how do I do this? Well I follow a simple rule "listen to the customer needs" When I understand what the client is expecting out of me as your trainer and strength and conditioning coach, I write up an individualized workout program based on a four to six week progression phase to help you the client progress towards those fitness needs. Every client has a different program base and all exercises are built and progressed from the the last series of workouts. Once you understand the regime your ultimate goal will always be achieved. We're on this journey together and I'm here to help you in anyway I possibly can.

Death of Box

Proper squat technique and why you shouldn't do the box squat

Tilt or Shift?

Correcting the lower extremities for better movement

Shoulder Issues

Correctional exercises for the shoulders

Mobility

Assessing thoracic mobility and how to improve function in the upper spine
